    • Field Detail

      • C0

        private model.Element C0
        C0 is a reference to the first Element of the tape. C1 is a reference to the middle Element of the tape. C2 is a reference to the last Element of the tape. length corresponds to the length of the tape.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TuringMachine

        public TuringMachine()

    • Method Detail

      • addElement

        public void addElement(int c,
                       java.lang.String letter)
        This method adds an Element to the tape with a given value through a head of the machine. pre: Three heads, C0 pointing to the start of the tape, C1 pointing to the middle and C2 pointing to the end have already been created. post: A new Element has been added to the tape.
        Parameters:
        c - is an int that indicates the head in which is going to take place the addition.
        letter - is a String that corresponds to the value of the Element to add to the tape.

      • readElement

        public java.lang.String readElement(int c)
        This method reads the value of the Element of a given head. pre: Three heads, C0 pointing to the start of the tape, C1 pointing to the middle and C2 pointing to the end have already been created. post: The value of the element has been correctly read.
        Parameters:
        c - is an int that indicates the head in which is going to take place the reading.
        Returns:
        a String with the value of the Element in the chosen head.

      • deleteElement

        public void deleteElement(int c)
        This method deletes an Element of the tape through a head of the machine. pre: Three heads, C0 pointing to the start of the tape, C1 pointing to the middle and C2 pointing to the end have already been created. post: The value of the element has been correctly read.
        Parameters:
        c - is an int that indicates the head in which is going to take place the elimination.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String with the information contained in the Turing machine.
